channel.title: Project Ghetto Scape [614] (Developers Needed)
channel.description:
Project Ghetto Scape 2011
Programmers: :)Acir2010 :) :mad:Geo (God Of Niggers) :mad:
Im using My friends Account
This Server Is in Development I need atleast 2 more good programmer
I am using Legacy 614 base Here is what ive Done so Far 1. Fixed The Mysql, Character Rendering Error, Fixed The Frames Antileech 2. Added Bgs Sgs Zgs, Statius Warhammer Specials (only Ags was there) 3. Had 78 Errors Now has 0 4. Gonna Change Vote4tokens to Kill4Tokens (Finaly Done) 5. Added 19 Commands (soon to be 50+) 6. Overloads 100% Working 7. Banktabs Fully Working
Future Updates: 1.Shops 2.Player-Npc Combat (got some done Huge Code!) 3.Korasi Sword (Working on Finding the Gfx And Emote) 4.Switching Tokens With Cash for economy (70% done) 5.Adding Npc Drops With Pickup (for Xtra Economy) 7.Gonne Remove All teleports And replace them with a walking Route so its more like rs 8.Gonna Add ::train Instead of ::master or ::setlevel (After I Add Exp Rates)
Current Commands Added 1. ::pvp 2. ::item 3. ::setlevel 4. ::mute(mod) 5. ::unmute(mod) 6. ::commands 7. ::yell 8. ::players 9. ::ancients 10.::bank 11.::curses 12.::getdrops 13.::lunars 14.::moderns 15.::sellitems 16.::teleto (mod) 17.::setgender 18.::donatorshop There Are like 30 More But there For Admin+
If Would Like to Help Us Code Please Leave a post Btw u Must Be good at Coding! And must know your ways through 614's
Geo Isnt Part Of Nrscape Anymore Because Some Kid named Scott hacked Forums and Stole the source somehow (the new 602 source) So hes Helping Me Make a 614 =)

item.title: Project Ghetto Scape [614] (Developers Needed)
item.dc:creator: @catscapepkz catscapepkz
item.description:
@catscapepkz wrote:

Project Ghetto Scape 2011

Programmers:
:)Acir2010
:mad:Geo (God Of Niggers) :mad:

Im using My friends Account

This Server Is in Development
I need atleast 2 more good programmer

I am using Legacy 614 base
Here is what ive Done so Far

  1. Fixed The Mysql, Character Rendering Error, Fixed The Frames Antileech
  2. Added Bgs Sgs Zgs, Statius Warhammer Specials (only Ags was there)
  3. Had 78 Errors Now has 0
  4. Gonna Change Vote4tokens to Kill4Tokens (Finaly Done)
  5. Added 19 Commands (soon to be 50+)
  6. Overloads 100% Working
  7. Banktabs Fully Working

Future Updates:
1.Shops
2.Player-Npc Combat (got some done Huge Code!)
3.Korasi Sword (Working on Finding the Gfx And Emote)
4.Switching Tokens With Cash for economy (70% done)
5.Adding Npc Drops With Pickup (for Xtra Economy)
7.Gonne Remove All teleports And replace them with a
walking Route so its more like rs
8.Gonna Add ::train Instead of ::master or ::setlevel
(After I Add Exp Rates)

Current Commands Added

  1. ::pvp
  2. ::item
  3. ::setlevel
  4. ::mute(mod)
  5. ::unmute(mod)
  6. ::commands
  7. ::yell
  8. ::players
  9. ::ancients
    10.::bank
    11.::curses
    12.::getdrops
    13.::lunars
    14.::moderns
    15.::sellitems
    16.::teleto (mod)
    17.::setgender
    18.::donatorshop
    There Are like 30 More But there For
    Admin+

If Would Like to Help Us Code Please Leave a post
Btw u Must Be good at Coding!
And must know your ways through 614’s

Geo Isnt Part Of Nrscape Anymore Because Some Kid
named Scott hacked Forums and Stole the source
somehow (the new 602 source)
So hes Helping Me Make a 614 =)
